|brand = Salt |model = Fiber Box |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Saltbox 1 A (1.0) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = November 6, 2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Salt_Fiber_Box |wlclass = AC3100 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = Fiber CPE, wireless router, analog phone gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 14165B920000J |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM68580;BROADCOM, BCM68580XIFSBG, TA1735 P21, W42-01 N2 W; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz <!-- 1.5 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646F-BCNB; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;BCM84881B0;BCM84881B0KFSBG; |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 10GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 94:6A:B0 |oui = 94:6A:B0
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 <!--(Type-A)--> |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 14-pin header,, J201 |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, J315
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, 1024QAM, XGS-PON, FXS, DECT, |addchip = Single-Chip Dual ProSLIC (FXS);Silicon Labs;Si32260-FM2;;1; ,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = Salt_2GHz_XXXXXX, Salt_5GHz_XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Arcadyan |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/20/2018 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLWG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = 2167 |rad1ac = 1733 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4366E;BCM4366EKMMLWG, UE1737 P30, 228-19 3; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = none |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 1000 |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N: 14165B920000J R01" is silkscreened on the main board :in an internal [https://lafibre.info/images/international/201803_suisse_salt_box_fibre_10gbps_09_original.jpg image] on the product page. OEM: [[Arcadyan]] (see [[Identifying manufacturer board P/Ns]])
* Web GUI: http://salt.box
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://lafibre.info/suisse/salt-fiber-box-10-gbps-annonce/ ''Suisse Salt Fiber Box: FTTH XGS-PON 10Gb/s'' on '''lafibre.info''']
===SoC=== *[https://globenewswire.com/news-release/2016/10/17/879847/0/en/Broadcom-Introduces-First-Commercial-PON-OLT-Silicon-for-XGS-PON-and-NGPON-2-Protocols.html ''BCM68620/BCM68580: 10G XGS-PON Fiber Home Gateway SoC'']
